document_data.mainbody:
Lharathuel Hesmyr was a human cleric of Chauntea in the village of Maskyrs Eye in the Vast in the midâ€“14 century DR.
In the late 1350s DR, she led services at the House of Plenty temple and had two acolytes Torzhin Hulvesper, the youngest son of a local horse-breeder, and Jhenta Sulpir, whod escaped an arranged marriage in Teziir. They were available to provide healing to the farmers.
